channel.title: Unlocking Files in VSTS
channel.description: Just posted a reply to the VSTS Forums, but this is such a common question that I thought I'd post the response here in a place that Google is more likely to stumble across it. The problem is when somebody...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Lee+00:00
item.description:
Iâve followed the steps and receive the following message: Tf10152: the item xxx must remain locked because its file type prevents multiple check-outs.
any sugestions?
item.dc:creator: Lee

item.title: Comment by Brian+00:00
item.description: To get the full path to a file or folder in TFS, just right click the item in Source Control Explorer, click Properties, select the value listed for the "Server Name" property and then click CTRL-C or right click and select copy.
item.dc:creator: Brian

item.title: Comment by Owais Aized+00:00
item.description:

item.dc:creator: Owais Aized
